channel.title: [PI]NPC Drops[PI]
channel.description:
I know how the drop rate system and those work in PI, but the problem is, that even tho i have drops in NPCdrops.tsm (Or whatever file that is), none of my server's NPCs drops anything O.O
Does this have something to do with it? Can someone help..
npcs[i].needRespawn = true; npcs[i].actionTimer = getRespawnTime(i); // respawn time dropItems(i); // npc drops items!

item.title: [PI]NPC Drops[PI]
item.dc:creator: @xShrawenx xShrawenx
item.description:
@xShrawenx wrote:

I know how the drop rate system and those work in PI, but the problem is, that even tho i have drops in NPCdrops.tsm (Or whatever file that is), none of my server’s NPCs drops anything O.O

Does this have something to do with it? Can someone help…

npcs[i].needRespawn = true;
npcs[i].actionTimer = getRespawnTime(i); // respawn time
dropItems(i); // npc drops items!

Read full topic
